translations.translation: asking, 'So when is the Day of Rising?'
He asks: "When will the Day of Resurrection be?"
He asks: “When will the Day of Resurrection be?”
He asks, "When will be the Day of Judgment?"
He asks, “When will be the Day of Resurrection?”
He asks: "When will be this Day of Resurrection"
He asks: When is the day of resurrection?
asking, 'When shall be the Day of Resurrection?'
He asketh: When will be this Day of Resurrection?
he asks, "When is this Day of Resurrection to be?"
He asketh: when will the Day of Resurrection be?
He asks, ‘When will be this “day of resurrection”?!’
He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
He asks: "When will be this Day of Resurrection?"
When will the Day of Resurrection be' he asks,
He asks, “When is the Day of Resurrection?”
He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
[75:6] He asks, ‘When is the Day of Resurrection?’ — the question is meant in mockery and denial.
(He asketh) 'Adiyy Ibn Rabi'ah asks in his denial of the resurrection: (When will be this Day of Resurrection) when will the Day of Resurrection take place?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَامَةِ } معناه مَتى ذَلِكَ

translations.translation: And His saying, {the Day of Resurrection} - what does that mean? When is that?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
لذلك { يَسْأَلُ } سؤال إنكار واستعباد: { أَيَّانَ } أي: متى يقوم
 وأيّ آن يقع { يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَامَةِ } [القيامة: 6] التى تبلى السرائر
 وتكشف الستائر فيها؟


بيِّن لي أيها المدعي وقت وقوعه
 حتى أكف وأمنع نفسي عن الفجور
 وأتوب عنها يقيناً وثقةً
 إنما قال على سبيل الاستهزاء والتهكم
